name: Minshan Console Table
description: In the midst of the Minshan mountains, wild pandas can be found munching away on their favourite delicacy: bamboo. Our console table has been so-named due to its bamboo-inspired frame with the turned struts sculpted to hold a delicate appearance with visible but smooth joins and topped with decorative finials. It's made from solid oak with a washed finish that the grain is visible through and features veneer shelves for displaying objects and books alike.
